name: javascript/classes/grid.js
Grid
description: The robot class contains all the functions and parameters specific to the grid

name: constructor
description: Overrides default grid settings and bootstraps the module

params.name: args
params.description: overrides for the standard grid config

name: createCanvas
description: Builds the canvas element to a size inferred from the config

name: layout
description: Lays out the canvas grid in rows and columns

name: draw
description: Draws the rectangular grid on the canvas

name: checkTouch
description: Ascertains whether the current event is a tap or a click

name: startRotate
description: Instigates the rotation logic on mousedown

name: stopRotate
description: Cancels the rotation logic on mouseup

name: rotate
description: Rotates the grid on mousemove

name: clamp
description:
Clamps a rotation value to a positive and negative
minimum and maximum integer range

name: listen
description: Rigs up the listeners for this class

name: javascript/classes/reporter.js
Reporter
description: The reporter class can report messages sent by other modules

name: constructor
description: Constructor expects a HTMLElement string identifier

name: report
description: Intercepts a broadcasted event and reports it

name: listItem
description: Creates a list item in the reporter's container

name: listen
description: Rigs the broadcast event listener for `broadcast:report` events

name: javascript/classes/robot.js
Robot
description: The robot class contains all the functions and parameters specific to the robot

name: constructor
description: Overrides default robot settings and bootstraps the module

params.name: args
params.description: overrides for the standard robot config

name: render
description: Renders the robot in proximity to the grid element

name: animate
description: Manoeuvres the robot according to its current state

name: connectTo
description: Attaches the robot to the grid of choice

name: validateX
description: Validates X as a coordinate on the board

name: validateY
description: Validates Y as a coordinate on the board

name: validateF
description: Validates F as a bearing reference contained in the config file

name: place
description: Places the robot at an arbitrary point on the board

params.name: x
params.description: the X coordinate of the location

params.name: y
params.description: the Y coordinate of the location

params.name: f
params.description: the compass heading of the location

name: move
description: Moves the robot according to its current heading

name: clampRotation
description: Clamps rotation to positive integers between 0 and 360

name: rotate
description: Rotates the robot to a new heading

name: left
description: Proxy function to rotate from speech and text parser

name: right
description: Proxy function to rotate from speech and text parser

name: report
description: Announces the position and bearing of the robot

name: broadcast
description: Listens for arrow and space key events

params.name: type
params.description: the event type to broadcast (rendered as broadcast:type)

params.name: detail
params.description: the detail object to send as an event argument

name: handleKeypress
description: Handles keypresses from arrow, enter and space key listener

name: handleClick
description: Handles clicks

name: registerCommands
description:
Registers commands that pertain to this robot instance
from a list of configurable regular expressions

name: listen
description: Listens for arrow and space key events

name: javascript/classes/sound-board.js
SoundBoard
description: The soundboard addition plays sounds broadcast to it by other classes

name: constructor
description: Bootstraps the class defaults

params.description: a DOM string to use as a sound toggle

name: play
description:
The play function can be invoked from anywhere via
a broadcast:sound event

name: toggleSound
description: Toggles whether any sound should play

name: reset
description: Resets the src of the audio object

name: listen
description: Rigs up relevant event listeners

name: javascript/classes/speech-parser.js
SpeechParser
description: The speech parser addition parses speech fed to it via the Web Speech API

name: constructor
description: Bootstraps the class defaults

name: listen
description: Invokes Mumble's listening cycle

name: javascript/classes/text-parser.js
TextParser
description: The text parser class adds the ability to translate a file to commands

name: constructor
description: Bootstraps the text parser

name: digest
description: Invokes a digest cycle for the interpreter

name: tick
description: Reads the queue line for line or cancels if it reaches zero lines

name: cancelDigest
description: Allows manual clearing of the digest cycle

name: readLn
description: Reads a line and relates it to a command

name: enqueue
description:
Creates a queue from the lines of an input file
and invokes the digest cycle

name: loadFile
description: Loads a file via the drag and drop and file APIs

name: addDropState
description: Adds a dragged-over state to the document element

name: removeDropState
description: Removes a dragged-over state from the document element

name: listen
description: Bootstraps event listeners

name: javascript/main.js
